articles.author: Stephanie Vermillion
articles.title: What To Watch For In January's Night Sky — Including Meteor Showers & Planet Sightings - Travel + Leisure Southeast Asia
articles.description: January's night sky will consist of two meteor showers, a plethora of planet sightings, and potential auroras.
articles.content:
Image Credit: Getty Images
January is a traditionally milder month for stargazing — particularly compared to the year’s main event, April’s solar eclipse. Yet, with two meteor showers, a plethora of… [+3868 chars]
